task.title: Save a PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to save a PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

step.cmd: Select Save to save the current presentation, or Save As to save a new presentation on your device or in OneDrive.

result.p: You have saved a PowerPoint presentation on your device.
